item.title: Content Creation for eCommerce Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We're currently looking for a talented content creator who is capable of the following:

1. Recording UGC Videos of Our Products
2. Interact with Products and Come Up with Great Ideas
3. Shoot and Record Video + Edit

We are a brand that sells prints in the tennis space, so experience in understanding that is important.

This individual would be hired for one month, and tasked to produce 10-15 video contents. From there, if it goes well - we can shift to full time retainer.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$66.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 02:40 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Video Ad
Skills: Content Creation, Video Ad
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Spokesperson Needed for 2-3 minute Business Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video spokesperson to help with a short informational video. The video will be roughly 2.5-3 minutes long.
You will be provided with a script. Some of the video you will create will also include some short video clips from the courses, and PDFs and images to help the text.
The video will be for an education company based in the United States, so we are ideally looking for a
We are upgrading many of our products and items and want to make the public aware of the changes we have made.
A script and all required images, PDFs, clips, logos, etc will be provided to you to help with any necessary components of the video. The video with all of its edits needs to be completed by July 1st, 2024.
Thank you for your help in advance.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 02:13 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, Spokesperson Video, Corporate Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Skills: Short Video Ad, Spokesperson Video, Corporate Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
